[{"element":"menu_content","data":{"id":"menu_content4_el10126080508","name":"menu_content4_el10126080508","label":"Menu_content4","key":"menu_content4_el10126080508"},"elements":[{"element":"div","data":{"name":"menu","label":"Menu","key":"menu"},"elements":[{"element":"link","data":{"id":"link1_el1248358625296","name":"link1_el1248358625296","label":"Quick Start","key":"link1_el1248358625296","to":"#quick-start","variant":"ghost"},"elements":[],"style":{}},{"element":"link","data":{"id":"link2_el349297473941","name":"link2_el349297473941","label":"Technologies","key":"link2_el349297473941","to":"#technologies","variant":"ghost"},"elements":[],"style":{}},{"element":"link","data":{"id":"link1_el1422273771111","name":"link1_el1422273771111","label":"Definition","key":"link1_el1422273771111","to":"#definition","variant":"ghost"},"elements":[],"style":{}},{"element":"link","data":{"id":"link1_el147924887904","name":"link1_el147924887904","label":"Reference","key":"link1_el147924887904","to":"#reference","variant":"ghost"},"elements":[],"style":{}},{"element":"link","data":{"label":"Test","key":"link1_el406096070797","to":"#test"},"elements":[],"style":{}}]},{"element":"div","data":{"name":"tab_2","label":"Tab 2","key":"tab_2"},"elements":[{"element":"markdown","data":{"id":"quick-start","name":"markdown1_el288031942674","label":"Markdown1","key":"markdown1_el288031942674","value":"# Quick Start.. > ### Welcome to Loopar Framework Documentation! Loopar offers developers a myriad of advantages, including speed, scalability, and cutting-edge technology. With its intuitive drag-and-drop interface and pre-configured components, developers can quickly prototype and iterate on web applications, significantly reducing development time and accelerating time-to-market. Moreover, DynamicStack's modular architecture and use of modern technologies like React and Tailwind CSS ensure scalability, allowing applications to easily grow and adapt to changing requirements and user demands. By leveraging the latest advancements in web development, including Shadow Color Names (ShadCN) for sophisticated styling effects, DynamicStack empowers developers to stay at the forefront of technology and deliver innovative, visually stunning applications that engage and delight users. > ### You need to learn > React > Taildwin > ShadCN > Node JS > MySQL"},"elements":[],"style":{}},{"element":"markdown","data":{"name":"markdown1_el170871399643","id":"technologies","label":"Markdown1","key":"markdown1_el170871399643","value":"# Dynamic full Stack Framework Loopar framework is designed to streamline the development process for dynamic web applications. Built upon a stack that includes Node.js and Vite for server-side functionalities, and React, Tailwind CSS with Shadow Color Names (ShadCN), and drag-and-drop capabilities for the client-side interface, DynamicStack empowers developers to rapidly create interactive web pages and CRUD applications. Key Features: > - **Node.js and Vite Backend**: Utilizing the power of Node.js and the fast build system of Vite, DynamicStack offers a robust backend infrastructure for server-side logic and build optimization. > - **React Frontend**: With React as the frontend framework, DynamicStack provides a flexible and efficient user interface development environment, allowing for the creation of reusable components and seamless data flow. > - **Tailwind CSS with ShadCN**: Leveraging Tailwind CSS with the added functionality of Shadow Color Names (ShadCN), DynamicStack enables developers to easily style their applications with a rich palette of predefined shadow effects and utility classes. > - **Drag-and-Drop Interface**: DynamicStack includes drag-and-drop functionality for effortless creation and customization of web pages and CRUD applications. Developers can simply drag elements onto the screen to dynamically generate and arrange components, significantly reducing development time and effort. > DynamicStack empowers developers to build dynamic web applications with ease, offering a comprehensive set of tools and functionalities to accelerate development and enhance user experiences. With loopar you can create advacend projects with minimal efort and minimal time, you nee ---","animation":"fade-right"},"elements":[],"style":{},"data-aos":"fade-right","data-aos-duration":2000},{"element":"markdown","data":{"id":"definition","name":"markdown1_el554828045598","label":"Markdown1","key":"markdown1_el554828045598","value":"# Definition The Loopar framework is a comprehensive solution for agile and efficient development of a wide range of web projects. Its modular approach and carefully integrated set of tools allow developers to create anything from simple blogs to complex data management systems with the same ease and speed. One of Loopar's most standout features is its ability to adapt to different types of projects. For instance, if you're building a blog or a static webpage, you can use its intuitive drag-and-drop interface to place predefined building blocks or images, or even write in Markdown directly. This enables developers to focus on content creation without worrying about the technical complexity of design and implementation. On the other hand, if you're working on a more robust project that requires advanced data management, Loopar has you covered there too. With its array of data management components such as inputs, selects, and dates, you can easily design interactive user interfaces to collect and display information. What's even more impressive is that Loopar automatically handles creating models in the database, controllers, and rendering views, based on the data definition provided by the developer. This means you can spend less time writing repetitive code and more time focusing on your application's business logic. Moreover, Loopar stands out for its modern architecture and high level of automation in the development process. By leveraging technologies like React and Tailwind CSS on the client side, and Node.js and MySQL on the server side, Loopar ensures optimal performance and a smooth user experience across all devices. In summary, the Loopar framework is a powerful and versatile tool that empowers developers to create a wide variety of web projects with ease and efficiency. Whether you're building a simple blog or a sophisticated data management system, Loopar provides the tools and flexibility needed to take your ideas to the next level","animation":"fade-left"},"elements":[],"style":{},"data-aos":"fade-left","data-aos-duration":2000},{"element":"row","data":{"id":"row1_el659531404297","name":"row1_el659531404297","label":"Row1","key":"row1_el659531404297"},"elements":[{"element":"col","data":{"id":"col1_el200242673378","name":"col1_el200242673378","label":"Col1","key":"col1_el200242673378"},"elements":[],"style":{}},{"element":"col","data":{"id":"col2_el1661338774","name":"col2_el1661338774","label":"Col2","key":"col2_el1661338774"},"elements":[],"style":{}}],"style":{}},{"element":"tabs","data":{"id":"reference","name":"tabs1_el959297039188","label":"Reference","key":"tabs1_el959297039188"},"elements":[{"element":"tab","data":{"name":"tab_el44907717562","id":"tab_el44907717562","label":"Document","droppable":true,"key":"tab_el44907717562"},"elements":[{"element":"html_block","data":{"id":"html_block1_el1079948949214","name":"html_block1_el1079948949214","label":"Html_block1","key":"html_block1_el1079948949214","value":"

Document

Document is a Meta model, where you can manipulate your data, for example, when you define graphit view, will be create a folder structure like this:

/apps
  app{appName}
    models
      {modelName}
        {documentName}
          client(folder to client files)
       document.js (server model)
            document-controller.js(server model controller)
